app.description: After a VCF-merge, read a VCF, look back at some BAMS to tells if the missing genotypes were homozygotes-ref or not-called. If the number of reads is greater than min.depth, then the missing genotypes is said hom-ref.

option.name: bamList
option.label: BAMS
option.description: path of indexed BAM path with read Groups. You can put those paths in a text file having a *.txt suffix.

documentation.h:pre: $ yourtool-mergingvcf 1.vcf 2.vcf 3.vcf > merged.vcf $ find ./ -name "*.bam" > bams.list $ java -jar dist/fixvcfmissinggenotypes.jar -f bams.list < merged.vcf > out.vcf

$ find DIR1 -name "PREFIX_*_variations.gatk.annotations.vcf.gz" |\ grep -E '(S1|S2|S3|S4)' |\ xargs perl vcftools_0.1.12b/perl vcftools_0.1.12b/bin/vcf-merge |\ java -jar dist/fixvcfmissinggenotypes.jar -d 10 -f <( find DIR1 -name "PREFIX_*final.bam" | grep -E '(S1|S2|S3|S4)' ) |\ gzip --best > out.vcf.gz
